about_the_game:
Marble Meadows is a bright and colorful homage to classic marble platformers. Explore a cozy cottage home filled with daring jumps and shaking surfaces. Zip around teacups and bounce off house plants in courses full of rewarding challenges!

We’re so glad to see you on this side of the forest! Welcome to the Marble Meadows, home to a quiet cottage tucked away from the world. Roll your marble through the house’s sprawling solarium, or up and across the homely kitchen tables. There’s much to enjoy in our corner of the world!

Not every spot in the cottage is quite so easy to get to! You'll need to use your surroundings if you want to get ahead. With handy checkpoints along the way, you can take your time making the perfect jump to land exactly where you need to!

If you just want a break from the hustle and bustle of the real world, feel free to explore the cottage or the rest of the meadows. The skies are clear and the shade is nice and cool. Roll your marble around to view the sights and relax in the garden.

Want to try something exciting? Use power ups or play special stages to complete gravity-defying feats! Whether you're launching yourself with the power of magnets or blasting through a time trial, there's certainly more to do in the meadows than just rolling around.

Are you someone who’s aiming for the full 100%? Complete quests all across the meadow in order to gain Steam Achievements. And if you’re clever enough, discover the 5 hidden achievements collected by only the most discerning of players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 3 GHz 4 Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce Maxwell Architecture (900 series) (4+ GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 4 GHz 6+ Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce Turing Architecture (1600 series) (8+ GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
